website_summaries.verdict: This multi-cooker by Crock-Pot can pressure cook, saute, brown, and bake in addition to slow cooking food.
pros: We love the ease-of-use features like it being programmable, the neat cord-wrap system, and that its components are dishwasher safe
cons: A few owners report that it broke after only a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Great crock pot
customer_reviews.text: I just threw out my old crock pot after decades of service. This new appliance is easy to use. The controls are logical and work perfectly. It is light-weight where my old crock pot insert was heavy, cumbersome, and hard to manipulate in the sink while washing. It looks good on my kitchen counter. It also has a saute/browning feature that negates the need for an additional pan for browning. But best of all, it cooks meals perfectly. I prepared a ham with pineapple in it and my husband said it was the best he had ever had. It actually melted in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: MooseHeart

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work..
customer_reviews.text: ..food prepped, friends invited for dinner. It stopped working after 5 minutes. the screen would flicker and turn off, then just reset. Sorry guys.
customer_reviews.author: DColem

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this crock pot! The bake feature comes in handy too when you are cooking something in the oven at a different temperature. It is very easy to clean. I hope it lasts for many years as my last crock pot!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is something I wanted for Christmas - because my old crock pot was too heavy and too small. This Multi-Cooker is wonderful. Very easy to use - very light inner pot to clean and the saute function works great. No more mess on the stove and transferring it to the cooker. I have made a pork roast, soup and a macaroni casserole. It is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with crockpot
customer_reviews.text: We think it only cooks on high. Every thing we have cooked on low is over cooked. It was not handed off as delivered. My husband came out of the house just as the delivery guy dropped it over our 5 foot gate. I have called the company. Only put on hold for long time. No answer Also went to website and it wouldn’t submit. We measured the temp on low and high. Both said 185 degrees. No difference. What is the temp supposed to be for hi and low?
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Watson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for busy moms!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality slow cooker that has made my life as a single mom so much easier! So far I have made a pot roast, chili, and chicken with veggies in it. I can't believe it took me 29 years to try out a Crock Pot. Dinner is a breeze now and I appreciate that it has a "keep warm" feature once your meal has finished cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Crock pot sticky with the old ones
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t deep enough. You can’t get a whole chicken in it. It’s only two setting on it. Go buy the old fashioned your results are better.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot worked on 5 different occasions only! Went to use it today, added our chicken and all other spices, went to check on it after 1 hour it was off completely! Turned it back on and screen display and lights were flickering and turned off again! Now it won't turn at all! I paid alot of money for a piece of crap crock pot and want a full refund! Some needs to contact me asap!
customer_reviews.author: c tofer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working during first use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crockpot for my wife as a Christmas gift! She was super excited about being able to sear meat with this product. During her first use, the crockpot stopped working after 20 min. Not sure why it stopped working. The return process was extremely easy and I was given my full refund within 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: meikos ellis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slow cooker for the size and saute feature. Because it was a CrockPot brand, I did not buy insurance, I also unboxed it and immediately threw the packaging in the recycling bin. My mistake. It never worked. It appears the control panel is bad as it will turn on and then immediately turn off. Very disappointed in the product. It was an expensive lesson learned and total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Max 4-hour warming
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooker because it's got a lightweight non stick insert that is super easy to clean and won't crack like my stoneware one did. I also have a rice/multi cooker (not instapot) which won't sautee. I really like that feature on this pot. The programming is easy and intuitive. The only drawback is it will only hold warm for 4 hours. My stoneware pot held warm for 6. I need the time because I work all day. I fix dinner at 6am to eat at 6pm. This is why one needs multiple crocks. My oven only gets used on holidays and when the weather suddenly turns cold and I need to heat up the house.
customer_reviews.author: Leah R.

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3 weeks and I've used it three times and it worked great, but don't buy it cuz now it won't work for me anymore. The fourth time I tried to use it (and it's brand new) it loses power and shuts itself off after a minute you start it.. now I'm out a hundred bucks and it's too late to return it..
customer_reviews.author: Chris Larson

customer_reviews.title: Mine stopped working, too.
customer_reviews.text: I truly loved this crockpot - which is why I am even more disappointed that it stopped working, just as others have reported. I've owned it for about 8 months, and only used it a handful of times - and, just like other users have experienced, it suddenly started turning itself off during cooking. The screen would flicker - and then the whole thing would go dark. I'm so sad. It was really great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Burley

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: When first trying to use this crock pot, it wouldn't stay on for the set time. The second time we tried using this, it wouldn't turn on at all. Fortunately Crock Pot stands behind their product and sent a replacement immediately free of charge. One star for quality. 5 Stars for customer service. Note: The replacement unit has so far worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Willi Wurst

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooker
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the pot are a great feature and one reason we purchased this cooker. We've used it several times and it's great. However, note that if you are used to a traditional porcelain crock pot, this product cooks differently. We bought this to replace a broken porcelain crock pot. Be sure to keep an eye on your meals while they cook until you get used to how this product heats and operates.
customer_reviews.author: Teri S.

customer_reviews.title: Severe Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and read all the 1 star reviews. The common denominator is that this very expensive crock pot will shut itself off, and after a few uses, you have yourself a $90 planting pot. Still trying to work a refund, but my hopes are not high since they employ customer service folks who barely speak english.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for less than 5 months and it has stopped working. Last time I used it everything was fine. Now today it cooked for about 2 hours and turned off. Turn back on and display flickers and shuts off after a few minutes. Had to transfer my food to oven. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: Only used this twice, but very satisfied each time. The browning feature is awesome. I pitched a crock pot that was over 40 years old but still worked because there was lead in the glazing. Having a removable/dishwasher safe liner is a huge improvement. Looking forward to more cooking adventures.
customer_reviews.author: corgi lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, along with cookbook. She loves its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet durable.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and easy to clean. Lightweight, so you're not beating up your sink likr the heavy ceramic crock-pots. I have only used it to slow cook and saute and it works well. I do recommend though that when using the low setting, set the timer for 8 hours or more, even if you only need it to cook for 2 hours. Otherwise it gets too hot and can burn on the bottom or dry out your meal.
customer_reviews.author: Megan J Kerr

customer_reviews.title: don't ever leave it alone even when it is on off
customer_reviews.text: We used the crockpot and then after it was clean I left it on top of my stove. It was pushed to the back of the stove while cleaning the kitchen and suddenly the whole house was filled with smoke. The long handle hit the burner switch and turned it on. The whole bottom of the pot melted all over the range and destroyed the pot. When I called CrockPot they did not seemed concerned but offered me another pot that had bad reviews and cost half as much. They said they were out of stock on all others. Just think if we had left the house after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: John McCartney

customer_reviews.title: I love how light it is
customer_reviews.text: It does all the things it says it can do, and the insert is lightweight, so cleaning and carrying is a breeze. My previous crockpot had a heavy stoneware insert, and I had to have my husband clean it. Now I can cook and clean-up myself and we're both happier!
customer_reviews.author: Ambir P.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a similar cooker that finally gave out. This one heats up quickly, has a great non-stick surface, and cleans up easily. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, is because the temperature settings are limited on the "brown/saute" setting. Low is sometimes too low, and high is a bit much for most foods. A medium setting would have been nice, but for the price, this is a great little cooker. We use it nearly every day - and sometimes multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dnichols

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working the second time I used it. And I was 2 days over the return window which turned out to be much shorter than Amazon’s usual return policy. What a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: polly

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle
customer_reviews.text: Cooks everything on high. Too late to return so when I use I cook everything on low. Have to keep close eye on it so that food doesn’t get overcooked.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Boudreault

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Does not cook well.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this crockpot 2 months and it is terrible. It takes 10+ hours to cook a roast. My old crockpot would cook a roast in about 6-7 hours and that was to the falling apart stage. After 10:45 of cooking a roast in this one, it’s just barely done not falling apart. I tried to put it on the lowest BAKE setting but it cooked so fast it cooked away all the liquid and started burning. I will go back to a regular crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best multi cooker around.
customer_reviews.text: This works for everything. Easy to clean. Can cook a lot of different foods. It is very handy. I don't even use oven or stove that much. Very convenient and time saving, on cooking. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Tuiaana

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on all fronts
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is wonderful! It does a great job of browning meats and transitioning to slow cooker mode, so you don't need to use multiple pans. I have used it for chuck roast, chicken breasts, soups, and chili. Super easy to wash as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-cooker, but......
customer_reviews.text: I really like this multi-cooker, but I wish I had returned it when I first received it as the lid does not fit properly and I have to constantly adjust the cook times on everything I make. Kind of defeats the purpose of the crock pot, multi-cooker! Anyone know if I can get a replacement lid for this?
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 1.5 years, used maybe 6 times. While using it the last time, the lights on the front kept blinking and the unit would turn off. I would reset it and same thing would happen. Luckily , it was at the end of the cooking time, so my meal was done. Tried it the next day and same thing happen. Save yourself some frustration and DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/died after 1 1/2 yrs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice but it just stopped working, display flickered first! I bought this in November 2018!!! Does not last with light use!!!c
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Deatherage

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance for any home cook!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. I've never found the perfect slow cooker but this is pretty close to my dream one. The only thing I would change would be the ability to close the steam vent for some recipes because they can dry out if you don't have enough liquid. And when your not at home that could be a problem. But, I've had other crock pots with the same feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crockpot and was only able to use it once before it stopped working. Unfortunately I had no idea it wouldn't work, so I am not outside of my return period and out of $60. Save your money and go buy a crockpot in the store. This is the second time that an Amazon kitchen appliance has randomly stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Prater

customer_reviews.title: Best Crock Pot Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crockpot for my daughter for her birthday and decided to get me one. After using it I fell in love with it. I've already cooked beans in it with no trouble at all. Very easy to clean. Also cooked chicken on the brown/sauté setting! Turned out wonderful. It is so great, I bought my other daughter and niece one too. Everyone should replace their old crockpot with this wonderful appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cooker
customer_reviews.text: Have found many uses. Time saver and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great dinner helper
customer_reviews.text: I need to make two different menus when I cook due to diet differences. Being able to put everything in one pot and press start and then come home and have it finished is great. Love that you can saute a roast in the pot which saves dirty pot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: This slow cooker is awful!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to all the bad reviews before purchasing it. I was making stew for St. Patty's day. The browning worked fine but the slow cooker did not. Had it on high for over ten hours and it did not cook at all. Please don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: TJN

customer_reviews.title: Crockpot 3-1 multi-cooker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crockpot, I like the the fact that I can do everything in one pot.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: love this slow cooker makes life in kitchen a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Simone P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I would buy if and give it for a girt. The features are nice. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: No lock system to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: It does not have a sufficient lock system to store or travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Lamay

customer_reviews.title: Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This slow cooker is a great item and for the price good quality.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Defective - 2nd use and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product 5 weeks. First time worked fine. Second use, turns off after a few minutes, regardless of setting. Too late to return to Amazon. Will try to claim company warranty through Crock-Pot now.
customer_reviews.author: Lene

customer_reviews.title: Cooking made easier! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to in the kitchen. It does everything as advertised. From browning to slow cooking, it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Handles are nice
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the crock pot cooking bags do not fit around the side handles very well. You can still use the cooking bags, but not the same fit as one without this type of handle. Love the insert, very easy cleanup. I also love the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Chiddo

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it stopped working halfway through cooking
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this crockpot but after three uses it no longer will turn on it shuts off after you press start sometimes it shuts off as soon as you turn it on. It started doing this halfway through cooking something on the brown sauté setting
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product love it, so easy to use. This is so handy for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Irving

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight easy to clean and can also brown meats
customer_reviews.author: j.yo

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 8 months
customer_reviews.text: It cooked pretty slow from the beginning and crapped all the way out today, Sept 8. Bought it in February.
customer_reviews.author: T.Kern

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase I have made when it comes to crock pots. Light weight, versatile, and amazingly simple to use. We are going to use in ourRV, in our kitchen and we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Good crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Made macaroni cheese in new crockpot. Worked fine, cooking pork picnic ham now
customer_reviews.author: kim laffey

customer_reviews.title: All tasks one pot
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice to be able to have one pit to clean rather than several
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after using 10-12 times!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thing broke on me after barely using it. Think I made chili 6 times and some brisket about 4. Terrible cheaply made product, nothing like the crock pots of old. For $90 it basically cost me $10 per use...wow.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sear, sauté and slow cook all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can sear and sauté before I slow cook - all in one pot = less to clean!! The price is great for all it can do. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It cut out 2 hours into a 9 hour slow cook!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of absolute money - it burnt out on the first slow cook experience of a pot roast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The control buttons quit working.
customer_reviews.text: After using about 5 times, the control buttons quit working and if they do, they crock pot stocks cooking in the middle of a meal. I want to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Penny M. Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: Love the light weight crock
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can sear right in the crockpot without an extra step on the stove. Also interior crock is super light weight and goes in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kienzle

customer_reviews.title: Tough roast
customer_reviews.text: Just got the crockpot yesterday and tried to cook a roast in on today and the meat was though never had this issue with my other crockpots. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Heating After Two Months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped heating after 2 months. Buying again but with protection pan. Otherwise it was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this crockpot.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible crockpot. Used once and does not work anymore. Absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: fergal cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Easy to use, very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: KatieKates

customer_reviews.title: Junk out of box
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 1 yr ago am opened to use for the first time today and it doesn’t work at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan h.

customer_reviews.title: Digital display is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I have maybe used this crockpot 4 times and the display flickers and whole thing shuts off. So very disappointed for the price I paid!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ramus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot does not heat up. Even on high it does not bring it to a boil. Have one that cost $29.00 that works great. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: richard osier

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that when using the slow cooker setting that when on Low food has burned or keeps boiling. Don’t feel comfortable leaving it on when not home
customer_reviews.author: David Mueller

customer_reviews.title: great item.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how much I am using it. Like all the different features.
customer_reviews.author: mary a schilling

customer_reviews.title: Love this pot!
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot does it all. I love it. I even bought my sister one !
customer_reviews.author: mary b roahrig

customer_reviews.title: Pretty enough for cooking and serving.
customer_reviews.text: My first attempt at using this was an old fashioned pot roast. First I seared my meat in a little oil in the pan. I then added beef broth, potatoes, carrots, cabbage and onions and set it on Slow Cook HIGH for one hour and LOW for another couple of hours. In three hours the roast was sumptuous. I thickened the juice and served my creation from the crock pot. It was wonderful and it all happened on my kitchen island, leaving my cook top free to do other things. The insert pan was easy to wash up. Glass lid is great to see the contents without opening and losing heat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is the slow cooker of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: After many years of use, my old Crock Pot shattered (it was ceramic) when I dropped it while washing it. This Crock Pot is light and easy to move around, so no worries of dropping and it breaking. Instead of browning your meat in a pot on the stove top first, this all-in-one option allows you to quickly do it in this container. It heats quickly, browns perfectly, and has options for you to control temperature and timing. I have not yet used the "baking" option, but it does that, too. If you're a fan of slow cookers, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot for the money is simple incredible. Searing meat before you cook it is so easy and perfect. Then leave the meat in broth to become tender. I'm no cook by any means, but this crockpot sure makes me look like one):
customer_reviews.author: Jacknyd

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of aluminum crock. Overall works well.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger crock- this is what I was able to find. I don’t like the material- this lightweight aluminum nonstick material as opposed to the traditional ceramic crock. I am dubious of how long this will last as it seems like the surface will scratch easily. I would certainly not recommend putting it in the dishwasher, even though the instructions say you can. I do appreciate the additional temperature controls on this crockpot. It makes cooking very easy.
customer_reviews.author: JC in ATX

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses over 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My initial reviews would have been five stars. It’s a single pot to brown, simmer or slow cook. It’s easy to clean. Bought on February. First five uses were great, but after giving it a summer off, I just pulled it out to do stew and it is no longer working. As it warms up to braise, it shut down with lights first flickering then nothing. I tried the different modes (braise, slow cook, and oven) all with the same effect. My conclusion, bad design or fabrication. It’s next stop: Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to slow cook a chuck roast for the Super Bowl. Let it cook throughout the day. When I checked on it, it never reached a high enough temperature. Even on high it could never reach a boil. Chuck roast came out rubbery and was not tender at all. Forgot to return this item so I’m stuck with a $100 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks too hot
customer_reviews.text: While I want to love this, I just can’t. It is incredibly easy to clean. Literally nothing sticks to the pot. But the liner is so thin that it gets too hot and burns anything that is touching it. I love the idea of it being multi functional, it just cooks way too hot
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Such a great feature to be able to fry in it & brown your meat first!!! I was looking at the Williams and Sonoma All Clad that has browning feature but the price was high & reviews were bad! This one is definitely worth it! Controls r easy to use & the pot is much lighter than the usual heavy ceramic pot & a lot easier to clean! (No more soaking the ceramic pot)
customer_reviews.author: Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Super Crock Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this crock pot! I brown the meats and sauté onions and garlic and then I cook everything all in one pot. The only thing I haven’t done yet is bake in it. I doubt that I will be disappointed. An no stoneware crock to break. It’s super easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: rosie'smom

customer_reviews.title: Busy families need one!
customer_reviews.text: A gift to my daughter who says she uses it several times a week. I’ve tasted the food cooked in it and it’s delicious. I had bought a different model and exchanged it at a local store for this one before Christmas. I’m glad I did. This does everything in one pot.
customer_reviews.author: FrankiesNana

customer_reviews.title: seemed like a great product at first...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product for three months. It worked great the first two times...It sauted perfectly. On the third try, I wanted to use the slow cooker but it kept turning off. I had to finish dinner in the oven. I tried again and now it will not say on after seconds!
customer_reviews.author: candace jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good but makes a weird cracking sound most f the times
customer_reviews.text: Good for slow cooking. Takes too long to sakte ao no use for that. Bake i havent tried. Makes a cery weird sound half the times..like electricity cracking. Rest have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik

customer_reviews.title: Limited use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and her husband for a Christmas gift and after limited use, it has quit working. She said it comes on but cuts off after a few minutes. Bought for 2018 gift so doubtful that it’s covered under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Can I use liners with cooking versions?
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know if I can use the crockpot liners. It will make clean up so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! It makes cooking in a crockpot so easy! I love that I can brown/sauté down what I need to then just throw it on slow cook and go! No more fitting extra pots! So far very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Roberts

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first slow cooker. The ability to control the temperature from sauteing to slow cooking is fantastic. Unit is easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: R. KING

customer_reviews.title: Takes longer to cook than my previous slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I cooked a beef stew on high for 8 hours and the potatoes were not quite done. My normal cooking time is six hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Being used!
customer_reviews.text: My mother wanted a crockpot that was simple to use. She doesn't normally cook because she lives alone, but she is using this crockpor!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Super easy to use, easy to clean and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were more stars to rate this product. This is now an everyday essential in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality buy it's nice to have chicken or beef cook while I'm at work i get home dinners done
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Slow-Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this slow-cooker, saute/brown, bake pot. Makes everything easy and is so versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.text: We used it once in March now just trying to use again and it’s broken and won’t even turn on. Sucks!

product_meta.title: Crock-Pot 3-in-1 Multi-Cooker, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Crock-Pot 3-in-1 Multi-Cooker lets you brown/sauté, slow cook, bake, and keep warm using just one appliance, meaning less mess when cooking multi-step recipes. The Crock-Pot Multi-Cooker is not only great for everyday use, but it also comes in handy for special occasion meals and holiday entertaining. Oven space can fill up quickly, but this 3-in-1 multi-cooker makes it easier to manage it all. Plus, when not in use, the convenient integrated cord storage lets you neatly store it away.
feature_bullets: Eliminate the need for multiple pots and pans with this versatile multi-cooker
6-quart capacity is perfect for weekly meal preps or servings for 7 or more people
Brown/sauté, slow cook, bake, and keep warm using just one appliance
Easy-to-read digital display lets you adjust temperature and cook time allows you to cook around your schedule
Integrated cord wrap at the base keeps your counters free of unsightly wires
Dishwasher-safe non-stick cooking pot for easy cleanup; Cord Length: 24"
